open_risks: Deleveraging spillover: precious-metals margin/forced liquidation propagates into equities/credit/FX via VAR shocks and de-grossing
Fed reaction-function/independence uncertainty (Warsh nomination narrative) sustains elevated real-rate vol and compresses equity duration multiples
Data whipsaw: ISM (incl. prices paid) and subsequent labor prints drive rapid rotation between growth-scare and sticky-inflation regimes
Commodity complex instability: continued disorderly moves in gold/silver and miners amplify risk via liquidity and sentiment channels
Policy/China response risk: strategic minerals stockpile rhetoric triggers retaliation/export controls or supply-chain repricing beyond niche names
